pages.content: A mask crafted from the head of a slain Eternal Guardian, granting Spectral Vision.

Crafted from the head of a slain §cEternal Guardian§r, this mask grants the wearer §dSpectral Vision§r.

While wearing the mask, you can reveal hidden entities and see through walls.
Craft the mask by adding two leather pieces to the sides of the §5Eternal Guardian's Head§r.

§6Growing Power§r

The longer you wear the mask, the more powerful the Spectral Gaze ability becomes, increasing its range and adding colors.
